TopicTitle: Weird little grey box on screen

Articles.Content:
I just noticed this today, there is a little grey box in the lower right corner of the screen, it first appears on the menu loading screen, then persists everywhere in game, even during flight.

Any clue what this might be?  I do have lots of mods, but I didn't see this yesterday, and haven't installed anything new since then.  Steam downloaded the 1.9.1 patch this evening, but not until after I first noticed this and opened steam to verify my game files.

It's been a while since I've had to report a bug like this, where are the log files?  and which one should I post?
I'm having this issue as well, It's not that annoying but when recording for videos, it becomes extremely annoying.
Hey, i am returning to KSP and got that little box as well,  anyone found out the cause already ?

If everyone who's commented on this thread could post their mod lists, that would at least allow a comparison to then get a short list of possible causes. I suspect some kind of incompatibility when you updated the game to 1.9.1 from an older version (1.8.1 or earlier) may be to blame, check that you have the most recent versions of all your mods.

i have the exact same problem, has anyone found a solution/found the problem to this yet?

\
